text: Radio Nacional del Paraguay (National Radio of Paraguay) is the official, state-run, international broadcaster of Paraguay.BBC Paraguay country profile Founded in the 1940s, in around 2005 it stopped transmitting in Short WaveFrom the Official Radio Station to the Public Radio Station. Editorial, Radio Nacional del Paraguay, 4 October 2009. In Spanish. and currently reaches its international audience exclusively through the internet. Locally it broadcasts on Medium Wave on the frequency 920 kHz. Programs are in Spanish and in the Guarani language. ==References== ==External links== *Radio Nacional del Paraguay official website Category:Radio stations in Paraguay Category:1940s establishments in Paraguay
title: Radio Nacional del Paraguay
